description: Everything from TV shows and commercials to feature films that have screened at Sundance Film Festival. Working primarily in DaVinci Resolve, with experience in HDR, ACES, and digital intermediate workflows.
clients_lead: Utah Resolve Colorist who has worked with Musical Artists like The Killers and Imagine Dragons, along with commercial brands like Verizon and Wells Fargo and marketing agencies like BBDO.
contact_lead: Whether you want a local Utah Resolve Colorist or a Remote Colorist, I’d love to work with you. Describe your project below and I’ll send you a quote.
